description: Investigate suspicious payments with Radar risk signals, early fraud warnings, disputes, and refund history. Mitigate losses by issuing full or partial refunds fast. Go beyond the basics by tapping any Stripe API resource when you need custom actions.

log_level.description: Minimum log level emitted by the server (default: info).

stripe_api_key.description: Stripe secret API key (sk_live_... or sk_test_...).

stripe_api_version.description: Optional Stripe API version override (e.g., 2024-06-20). Leave undefined to use your account default.

default_stripe_account.description: Optional default connected account ID. Used when stripe_raw_request omits stripe_account.

tools.name: stripe_status
tools.title: Stripe MCP Status
tools.description: Returns server health information and validates Stripe API connectivity.

stripe_account.description: Optional connected account ID override for the status probe.

tools.name: stripe_fraud_insight
tools.title: Stripe Radar Fraud Insight
tools.description: Fetches Radar risk data, early fraud warnings, disputes, and refunds for a payment.

include_events.description: When true, include disputes, refunds, and related events for additional context.

tools.name: stripe_create_refund
tools.title: Stripe Refund Creator
tools.description: Creates a refund for a charge or payment intent, supporting partial refunds and metadata.

amount.description: Optional amount in the smallest currency unit for partial refunds.

metadata.description: Optional metadata to attach to the refund.

tools.name: stripe_raw_request
tools.title: Stripe Raw API Request
tools.description: Direct access to any Stripe REST endpoint using the authenticated SDK client.

path.description: Stripe API path (e.g. /v1/customers or /v1/payment_intents/pi_xxx). Include query params directly in the path for non-POST requests.

query.description: Optional query parameters. Applied only when method is GET or DELETE.

method.description: HTTP method to use for the Stripe API request.

stripe_account.description: Optional connected account ID for the request.
